meanings.sent1: The city is urbanizing rapidly, with new buildings popping up everywhere.
meanings.sent2: People are urbanizing the outskirts of town by building more houses and businesses.
meanings.sent3: The small village was urbanizing so quickly that even the cows seemed surprised.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was urbanizing, transforming from rural simplicity to urban complexity.
meanings.sent5: The urbanizing of the neighborhood brought a sense of excitement and change to the residents.

meanings.definition: The process of developing urban areas.
meanings.sent1: Urbanizing requires careful planning and consideration of infrastructure.
meanings.sent2: The urbanizing of the city led to an increase in population and economic growth.
meanings.sent3: The urbanizing of the downtown area brought about a mix of old and new architecture.
meanings.sent4: The urbanizing of the region was like watching a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The urbanizing of the landscape transformed it into a bustling metropolis.
